entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -33.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 3:38 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -33.7°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -37.1°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Blizzard developing overnight. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
